Package com.ibm.vie.mazerunner.squares

Interface ISquare

All Known Implementing Classes:
Bushes, Lava, Mountain, Mud, Space, Treasure, Trees, Wall, Water
public interface ISquare
The top-level interface students will call to find out information about a square.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default ISquare
    duplicate()
    Duplicates the square dynamically, Students do not need to call this
    Location
    getLocation()
    Get the location of this square on the board
    String
    getSpriteName()
    Get the appropriate name of the sprite that reflects the current state of this square
    int
    getStepCost()
    The number of steps it takes to move to this square.
    int
    getStepCount()
    The number of times your player has moved to this space.
    String
    getTypeString()
    Gets the string name for the type of square.
    boolean
    isValidMove(IBoard board)
    Returns true if this is a legal square to move to FROM THE PLAYERS CURRENT POSITION
    boolean
    moveTo(IBoard board)
    Students do not need this.

  • Method Details

    • getLocation

      Location getLocation()
      Get the location of this square on the board
      Returns:
      location

    • isValidMove

      boolean isValidMove(IBoard board)
      Returns true if this is a legal square to move to FROM THE PLAYERS CURRENT POSITION
      Parameters:
      board - The game board the controller has provided you
      Returns:
      true if legal move, false otherwise

    • moveTo

      boolean moveTo(IBoard board)
      Students do not need this. Indicate your move by returning a Move from IPlayer.selectMove(IBoard). If you do decide to invoke it, there will be no effect.
      Parameters:
      board - - the board to make the move on
      Returns:
      true if the move was legal and was made, false otherwise

    • getStepCount

      int getStepCount()
      The number of times your player has moved to this space. Sometimes it will be necessary to move to a space more than once as different paths to treasure might overlap.
      Returns:
      The number of times the player has moved to this space.

    • getTypeString

      String getTypeString()
      Gets the string name for the type of square. May be useful for inspecting which squares are what if using 'instanceof' is not familiar enough.
      Returns:
      A string indicating the type of space. Subclasses will return a different value.

    • getStepCost

      int getStepCost()
      The number of steps it takes to move to this square.
      Returns:
      An integer of the step cost.

    • getSpriteName

      String getSpriteName()
      Get the appropriate name of the sprite that reflects the current state of this square
      Returns:
      the String name of the sprite

    • duplicate

      default ISquare duplicate()
      Duplicates the square dynamically, Students do not need to call this
      Returns:
      a copy of ISquare
